pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(e)Forests$(), $(e)Plains$() and $(e)Swamps$(). $(6)Mining Paradise().$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Ruby Bird can spawn in $(e)Dense Mountain$(). $(br)Black Bird can spawn in $(e)Beaches$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 1-3 $(item)Feathers$(), 20% chance of 1 $(item)Ruby$() if Ruby Bird

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Birds are an ambient mob that fills the Overworld. Even though they just fly around, they come in multiple pretty colors! So if you want some nice ambient mobs in your world, Better prepare your critter cage!
